strings.name: OpenStreetMap Central Salish Sea
strings.description: Mappers and OpenStreetMap users around Mount Vernon, WA
strings.extendedDescription: OpenStreetMap is an map of the world made by people like you. It's a map that you build, that's given away for free like wikipedia. Check out osm.org for more. We meet all the time to talk maps, make maps and have fun!
